channel.title: I have a bunch of questions if thats okay to put in in one post
channel.description:
ok well i have a question now
[ul][li]Is there any way to make players faster than NPCs because every time me or one of my friends hit an NPC the striking speed looks like your fighting with a two handed sword to the NPC always goes first [/li][/ul]
please and thank you :)
